data.title: Arnold Schwarzenegger: Movies, Photos, Videos, News, Biography & Birthday
data.meta_description: arnold schwarzenegger: Check out the list of all arnold schwarzenegger movies along with photos, videos, biography and birthday. Also find latest arnold schwarzenegger news on Times of India.
data.text:
Rajinikanth's '2.0': Did you know arnold schwarzenegger was Shankar's first choice for the villain instead of Akshay Kumar?

etimes.in / Aug 17, 2024, 12:05 (IST)

Akshay Kumar garnered praise for his distinctive portrayal of the cell phone-hating mutant scientist in '2.0'. Interestingly, Rajinikanth was originally set to face Hollywood legend arnold schwarzenegger in the role, not Akshay. Director S. Shankar revealed at a Mumbai press conference that Schwarzenegger was initially approached for the anti-hero part, with dates even secured. However, contractual conflicts between Hollywood and Indian film agreements prevented the collaboration from finalizing. Shankar noted, "We had considered Arnold and allocated dates, but contract issues led us to explore Indian actors." During the search for the antagonist, Shankar and Lyca Productions were also discussing a Hindi remake of Kathi with Akshay Kumar. "Everyone suggested Akshay, and I thought it was a good idea. I narrated the story to him, and he agreed," Shankar added. The film features Adil Hussain, Sudhanshu Pandey, and Amy Jackson, with music by A.R. Rahman.

Chris Pratt honors father-in-law arnold schwarzenegger on his 77th birthday

etimes.in / Jul 31, 2024, 13:06 (IST)

​Pratt posted a black-and-white photo of them playing chess, followed by a picture of himself standing behind Schwarzenegger, who was seated in a sofa chair. He wrote, 'Happy Birthday Arnold! You’re one of a kind. Looking forward to another year of sage advice, good cigars, chess whoopings, and hand-feeding homemade cookies to the many barn animals that live in your kitchen.'

arnold schwarzenegger delights fans with hilarious 'FUBAR' season 2 update

etimes.in / Mar 31, 2024, 12:59 (IST)

Action icon arnold schwarzenegger surprises fans with a personal health update, revealing the installation of a pacemaker. Despite concerns, he reassures fans of his well-being and commitment to filming "FUBAR" Season 2. Schwarzenegger plans a brief hiatus from weightlifting but remains determined to resume his active lifestyle by April. In a podcast episode, he shares details of his surgery and emphasizes his resilience.

arnold schwarzenegger to Frank Zane: Zodiac signs of most famous bodybuilders

TOI Astrology / Mar 30, 2024, 11:11 (IST)

Arnold, Jay, Dorian, and Lee, excelling in bodybuilding, showcased unique strengths tied to their zodiac signs. Their achievements inspire individuals worldwide, highlighting the power of determination and hard work in achieving fitness goals. They work really hard to build their bodies and become champions in the sport of bodybuilding. Let's look at some of the greatest bodybuilders ever and their zodiac signs:

arnold schwarzenegger shares hilarious heath update post pacemaker surgery, confirms FUBAR season 2

etimes.in / Mar 29, 2024, 17:14 (IST)

arnold schwarzenegger, known for his indomitable spirit, recently shared a lighthearted update about his health on social media following surgery for a pacemaker. Playfully referring to it as his 'pacemaker', he shared a humorous photo on X (formerly Twitter), showcasing a comical contraption on his chest complete with a voltage gauge and Duracell batteries. Despite the jest, Arnold assured fans of his well-being and readiness to start shooting for the upcoming season of FUBAR in April, despite his recent health setback. The 76-year-old actor's candidness about his surgery on his podcast, Arnold’s Pump Club, reflects a departure from his Austrian upbringing but demonstrates his commitment to transparency with fans. Despite the surgery, Arnold swiftly returned to his feet, attending an environmental event with Jane Fonda shortly after. Grateful for the care received at the Cleveland Clinic, Arnold's resilience and dedication to his craft, spanning from bodybuilding to Hollywood stardom and politics, continue to inspire. Fans eagerly anticipate his return to action, both on-screen and in real life.

"We couldn't have made Predator without him": arnold schwarzenegger remembers Carl Weathers

ANI / Feb 03, 2024, 11:20 (IST)

On Instagram, Schwarzenegger posted a series of throwback pictures accompanied by a heartfelt caption that read, "Carl Weathers will always be a legend. An extraordinary athlete, a fantastic actor, and a great person. We couldn't have made Predator without him. And we certainly wouldn't have had such a wonderful time making it." Reflecting on their time together, Schwarzenegger shared.

arnold schwarzenegger DETAINED at Munich Airport over undeclared luxury watch

etimes.in / Jan 18, 2024, 11:59 (IST)

arnold schwarzenegger was detained by customs officers at Munich airport for failing to declare a luxury watch. He was detained for 3 hours and criminal proceedings have been initiated due to tax evasion allegations. The watch, crafted by Audemars Piguet, was meant to be auctioned at a fundraising dinner for Schwarzenegger's climate initiative.

arnold schwarzenegger condemns antisemitism in powerful speech: Hatred will never ever win

etimes.in / Nov 08, 2023, 15:03 (IST)

arnold schwarzenegger denounced antisemitism in a powerful speech as he accepted the Award of Courage at the Holocaust Museum in Los Angeles. He emphasized the importance of change and the responsibility of the next generation to combat hatred. Schwarzenegger urged people to confront discrimination and negativity by speaking out and not allowing divisive forces to go unchallenged. He also mentioned the need for dialogue and emphasized the power of love over hatred.

arnold schwarzenegger meets Israeli survivors of Hamas attack

IANS / Dec 02, 2023, 17:16 (IST)

Former governor of California condemns October 7 attacks, offers support for Israel. He meets with family members of Israeli hostages held by Hamas in Gaza, presents them with bronze eagle statues. Schwarzenegger looks to spread peace over hate and anger. Survivor Ella Shani recounts her father's killing and cousin's kidnapping by Hamas. Schwarzenegger gets emotional, shows Ella his movie memorabilia. Meeting organized by Museum of Tolerance Jerusalem.

Bradley Cooper wanted Howard Stern to shave his head, play his brother in 'A Star is Born'

IANS / Nov 29, 2023, 17:13 (IST)

Hollywood star Bradley Cooper revealed that Howard Stern almost had a part in 'A Star Is Born'. "Did we ever talk about how I asked you to do 'A Star Is Born'?" asked Cooper of his longtime friend on an episode of 'The Howard Stern Show'.

'Terminator: The Anime Series' official teaser out now

ANI / Nov 12, 2023, 13:33 (IST)

The upcoming show 'Terminator: The Anime Series' has released its official teaser. Created by Japanese animation studio Production IG, the show will feature new characters and is set in a future war between humans and machines. The storyline revolves around a soldier sent back in time to change humanity's fate by protecting a scientist developing an AI system to rival Skynet. This marks the first animated production in the 'Terminator' franchise. The series will be available for streaming on Netflix, with the release date yet to be announced.
